title: Tormentor Mine
description:
A new dark romance from New York Times bestseller Anna Zaires
He came to me in the night, a cruel, darkly handsome stranger from the most dangerous corners of Russia. He tormented me and destroyed me, ripping apart my world in his quest for vengeance.Now he's back, but heâ€™s no longer after my secrets.The man who stars in my nightmares wants me.
author: Anna Zaires
